meanings.definition: Being a single unit or individual
meanings.sent1: The red ball is the only one left.
meanings.sent2: She has one pencil in her bag.
meanings.sent3: It was funny to see only one shoe on the doorstep.
meanings.sent4: The lone tree stood as the only one in the field.
meanings.sent5: The bright star was the one shining in the dark sky.

meanings.sent1: I need to write down the number one.
meanings.sent2: There is only one apple on the table.
meanings.sent3: He found joy in counting to one repeatedly.
meanings.sent4: The number one is like the leader of all numbers.
meanings.sent5: The number one is as important as the sun in the sky.

meanings.definition: A person of a specified kind or character
meanings.sent1: She is the one who always helps others.
meanings.sent2: He is the one with the funny jokes.
meanings.sent3: The one with the big hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She is the one who shines like a star in the group.
meanings.sent5: He is the one who leads the team to victory.
